message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.CY 

This paper deals with the task of opinion mining in online reviews about distance education programs. The paper presents an approach to extract general categories and specific aspects under discussion in a review together with their sentiment. This task falls under the sub-category of Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Information Retrieval (IR), which are covered by cs.CL and cs.IR respectively. The paper also discusses the use of machine learning techniques for text classification, which is covered by cs.LG. The paper also deals with the task of sentiment analysis, which is covered by cs.SI. Finally, the paper discusses the use of online communication and social media, which is covered by cs.CY.
